yo

verse 2 busta rhymes
and leave a mark until its deep in the floor
yall niggas fucked up yall shouldve never let me get my feet in the door
and then i step through fuck wipin my feet at the door
i be the deacon im beatin niggas and speakin the raw

sometimes i think that it be best if you run

cause you got your whole life ahead of you son
a whole new thing startin for me

while i continue to bless you with shit thats sacred to yall
even if i had to bend you in place
